channel.title: Is there somthing i should worry about - my forums
channel.description: ok since im offering subdomain forums is there anything i need to lookout for when i give them a set of forums

item.title: Is there somthing i should worry about - my forums
item.dc:creator: @mr_candy mr candy
item.description:
@mr_candy wrote:

ok most admins have access to server settings…so create a new group name then admin instead of administrator set the permissions so they can’t

if your clueless to what i mean heres a example

in server setting they can change the mysql database password so when the forums attempts to connect to the database it will show you the smf, error cannot connect to database at the moment

makes your forums unuseable but if this does happen go to your forums file and look at your settings file it will have the password there just change it back to what it was and all will be fine

if you dont understand any of that dont host!!!

Read full topic
item.source: Is there somthing i should worry about - my forums

item.title: Is there somthing i should worry about - my forums
item.dc:creator: @mvp566 mvp566
item.description:
@mvp566 wrote:

ok, they dont get ftp access all they get is adminship to there forums nothing else

item.title: Is there somthing i should worry about - my forums
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Don’t give FTP access. Make sure everything is done through you.
